blogPost.excerpt: Startup goes MRRR - Parody on 'Printing Machine goes BRRR'. This is for all solo entrepreneurs, startup founders and indie hackers out there seeking that sweet MRR, that need a good laugh on this Friday.
blogPost.body: Startup goes MRRR - Parody on 'Printing Machine goes BRRR'. This is for all solo entrepreneurs, startup founders and indie hackers out there seeking that sweet MRR, that need a good laugh on this Friday.
blogPost.title: MRRR.money - Startup goes MRRRRR
blogPost.author: Erwin Lengkeek

localize.description: 创业者去MRRR--模仿 "打印机去BRRR"。这是为所有的个人创业者，创业创始人和独立黑客有寻求甜蜜的MRRR，需要一个很好的笑在这个星期五。
創業者去MRRR--模仿 "打印機去BRRR"。這是爲所有的個人創業者，創業創始人和獨立黑客有尋求甜蜜的MRRR，需要一個很好的笑在這個星期五。

previous.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
previous.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.

localize.description: Post.co是在您的团队中分享大小新闻的最佳方式。Post.co是一种简单的、低风险的分享团队更新的方式，它的设计可以替代混乱的线程和尴尬的团队邮件回复。非常适合远程团队保持联系。
localize.tagline: 最简单的方式在你的团队中发布大大小小的新闻。

localize.description: Post.co是在您的團隊中分享大小新聞的最佳方式。Post.co是一種簡單的、低風險的分享團隊更新的方式，它的設計可以替代混亂的線程和尷尬的團隊郵件回覆。非常適合遠程團隊保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的方式在你的團隊中發佈大大小小的新聞。

localize.full_text: 数字氧是清洁能源的未来。寻找投资者。
數字氧是清潔能源的未來。尋找投資者。
